message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking for $180 to start. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me at that price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest.  I could come down to $150.  I think that's a fair price reflecting the true value of this product.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above $120. I can go up to $130, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. Can you meet me there?
